column4: hi friends,my external card reader is not been detected in the system,but it is showing in lsusb,help needed
output of the lsusb is : http://pastebin.com/n9rAF8fs
do you have a card on it?
:yes i have a card in it
i have seen your pastebin URL but I cant do anything with it
'ls /dev/sd*' does it give you another drive or not?
:It is saying no such file or direcotry
I ran out of ideas, sorry that i cannot provide help
